We can't read your ticket because it is bound to your account. In order to share with the community you would need to do one of the following:

1. Copy and paste the tickets and responses.

2. Screenshot and share via image hosting.

As a rule of thumb, if you treat people who can help you like shit; they become less likely to help you. The customer is always right is not a truth. Businesses have the right to deny service in most cases.

If others are harassing you in game, you can mute in game and then report post game.

And just to go ahead and clear up a misconception. My blue name does not mean I work for Riot. I am just a community member like any other poster.
